CustomField.description: A forumla field that shows up as a link on the Agreement Explorer tab, which will direct user to the result page once clicked.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Apttus__Context__c, "Agreement",HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementExplorerResults?queryId=" & Id & "&context=Agreement", Name ), "Agreement By Account(s)", HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementExplorerResults?queryId=" & Id & "&context= Agreement By Account(s)", Name ), "Agreement Search", HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementExplorerResults?queryId=" & Id & "&context=Agreement Search", Name), "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A forumla field that shows up as a link on the Agreement Explorer tab, which will direct user to the result page once clicked.
CustomField.label: Title
